result.eng: The work will take six months.
result.html: Glacfaidh an obair sé mhíThe work will take six months.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ an obair sé ṁíThe work will take six months.

result.eng: How much do you pay per month?
result.ga: Cé mhéad a íocann tú sa mhí
result.orig: Cé mhéad a íocann tú sa mhí
result.html: Cé mhéad a íocann tú sa mhíHow much do you pay per month?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad a íocann tú sa ṁíHow much do you pay per month?

result.html: Trí chéad euro sa mhíThree hundred euro per month.
result.ponchtml: Trí ċéad euro sa ṁíThree hundred euro per month.

result.html: Ceithre chéad euro sa mhíFour hundred euro per month.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre ċéad euro sa ṁíFour hundred euro per month.

result.html: Cúig chéad euro sa mhíFive hundred euro per month.
result.ponchtml: Cúig ċéad euro sa ṁíFive hundred euro per month.

result.eng: Four hundred and fifty euro per month.
result.ga: Ceithre chéad caoga euro sa mhí
result.orig: Ceithre chéad caoga euro sa mhí
result.html: Ceithre chéad caoga euro sa mhíFour hundred and fifty euro per month.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre ċéad caoga euro sa ṁíFour hundred and fifty euro per month.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart don ċoṁlaċt seo a ċur in iúl dúinn sé ṁí ó ẛinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
